Introduction

This page lists the various meetings held by the OBO Foundry Operations Committee. Access to minutes of committee meetings is restricted to committee members.

See the OBOCalendar for scheduled meetings.

Details

OFOC meetings

Chairs are assigned on a rotating basis. The chair should create agenda, host call, clean up minutes, etc. We have been keeping minutes using Google Docs in the "obo-operations-meetings" shared folder (access restricted to committee members). If you are unable to chair the call assigned to you, please find someone to take your place or trade with you.

|meeting date|chair|link to minutes| |:-----------|:----|:--------------| |13 Oct 2015 |Melanie|| |6 Oct 2015 |James| | |22 Sep 2015 |Ramona| | |8 Sep 2015 |Richard| | |25 Aug 2015 |Jie | | |11 Aug 2015 |Janna| | |28 July 2015|ICBO |No meeting | |14 July 2015|Colin| | |30 June 2015|Darren| | |9 Jun 2015 |Bjoern|20150609 OFOC meeting | |26 May 2015 |Alan |public forum | |12 May 2015 |Colin|20150512 meeting| |28 Apr 2015 |Ramona|20150428 meeting| |14 Apr 2015 |Richard|postponed until 4/28| |31 Mar 2015 |Jie |20150331 OFOC meeting| |17 Mar 2015 |Janna|20150317 OFOC meeting| |3 Mar 2015 |James O|20150303 OFOC meeting| |17 Feb 2015 |Melanie|20150217 OFOC meeting| |3 Feb 2015 |Richard|03FEB2015 OFOC Meeting| |20 Jan 2015 |Jie |20150106 OFOC Meeting| |6 Jan 2015 |Ramona|20150106 OFOC Meeting| |9 Dec 2014 |Janna|20141209 OFOC Meeting| |25 Nov 2014 |James|20141125CommitteeMeeting| |10 Nov 2014 |Colin|20141110CommitteeMeeting|

Minutes for older meetings are available on Google Docs (restricted access).
